data.text: @risingaction @camcharronyvr It was very very good. Could watch old games from way back…my only issue is living Saskatchewan that’s a me problem. Haha…any games against flames, oil or jets were blacked out for 48 hours!! I don’t miss those days avoiding my phone for spoilers.
@camcharronyvr Premium has been pretty good so far…wish it was cheaper. I’ll just cancel once the season is over.

@camcharronyvr Really ? That was my impression but I could be wrong. I’ve only had time for the Canucks. The preds home game was gone after 24hrs that’s the one I missedstarted with the basic package but they had weird games blacked out for reasons i have no clue..there has to be a better way

@camcharronyvr @risingaction Being in Saskatchewan and working nights this new service makes is hard. MUST watch game that day or it’s gone forever….nhl center ice we could watch games from years past.
@camcharronyvr You can only watch the replay for up to 24 hours after the game…not ideal…..no local blackouts with premium like nhl centre ice but the small window to watch the game kinda blows.
@dude_ab1ded https://t.co/j6BKGsgng6
@TheStanchion If this is true. Holy 🤬.
@Conditional1st Petey was taking runs at stutz all game as well. Love it!
@pete_gas Let’s get the captain signed
@TheStanchion The comments are great. “Always have to throw in a 2nd” lol.
@TheStanchion Feb9 1996. Canucks/Oilers @ northlands coliseum, 3-2 OT win, mogilny, Russ & tim hunter with goals. Cheered from start to finish rocking my black skate jersey. Great times.
@jabo_vancouver Man , he was such a 2way beast for nucks … still bitter how the relationship ended. No trade clauses suck. lol.
@JordanRaptors @malcolmert Uhh. Go raptors ? 🤔
@pete_gas What a weak call.
@_blueheron_ @BertHuttVan Ill take the Petey and Boeser. You can have Mitchell and black skate
@malcolmert I’ll buy some tickets on the cheap , let me know
@taj1944 You’re a clown.
@QuadreIli Outstanding. Thx Quads . I searched high and low couldn’t find a video clip of it. Nhl app stopped streaming games. I need to signup with sportsnow this season to watch  nucks games.
@QuadreIli What happened? Plz tell. I’m stuck at work.
@TheStanchion @brycecharney Canucks still have some years to win that cup 🤞 🙏
@Hockey_Robinson Never a bad idea shooting pucks with the boy.. you’ll love the mackinnon goal no doubt
@samanthacp_ I must know what book this is ?
@jabo_vancouver If it wasn’t for that NHL record bad Penatly kill at the start of the year…but here we sit and Canucks are still alive 👍
@Hockey_Robinson Yes I wanted to chat about him a little while back. He’s looking really good https://t.co/tt7rPz7nL2
@ChrisFaber39 Sorry for your loss , Chris. 🙏
@TheStanchion @13_dmac Maybe some Brady Keeper spicing things up as well..
@pete_gas @HerrDrFunk @tommykippes2 I won the cup in NHL22 with Canucks. Does that count ?
@ArashMemarzadeh New regimes clean up messes. That’s usually how it works. Lots of work to do. Let’s get started

@seyerpa @krusty027 @Hockey_Robinson Got to see him play many many times in Regina for the pats. He was my favourite. Getting his autograph at training camp the year after Canucks drafted him I was so pumped !!
@danriccio_ Hahahaha that was fast. Very fitting for the day 👍
@Hockey_Robinson Yeah both amazing talents. I’m lucky Bedard gets another year in Regina.
@croomskie @Hockey_Robinson A winning franchise should be able to slow cook prospects in the minors IMO. No rushing them when your competitive year after year. Ahhh I dream of these days. Haha
@Hockey_Robinson Bedard or Hughes ?  Who you taking. 😁
@Hockey_Robinson Figure of speech I know haha. Kid hasn’t even turned 21 yet . Comical how some players get written off so early in sports.
@Hockey_Robinson Don’t even think about it is right ….Who are these people ? Lol. Did “they” think he’s another Yakupov ?
@patersonjeff HUGE. followed by back2back with Vegas. Gotta love being in the hunt , jeff !

@nickbondi Would’ve/could’ve is always fun…. What do you think oilers could’ve given Canucks in a trade for markstrom before he signed with flames ??  Looking back they should’ve tried harder. If one of Canucks goalies is going to Alberta would’ve been nice to get something back. Haha

@ThomasDrance @riotsurvivor @vancitylibyan Either way could only keep Demko or marky till the expansion draft…Looking back I’m guessing oilers would cough up a high draft pick and maybe more in a trade to acquire one of these elite goalies. If one was ending up in Alberta would’ve been nice to get something back. 🤷‍♂️
@TheStanchion Had to scroll for awhile but I found it !! Petey looks happy 😊 https://t.co/FZorp0wyyv
@TheStanchion Who did Halak give the belt to ? I can’t find it on your timeline 🤷‍♂️ Demko ? Petey ?
@harmandayal2 It’s better this way. Leave it. 😉
RT @TheStanchion: The Thatcher Demko Experience: https://t.co/EJvPkMeywD
@TheStanchion Gotta keep that streak going haha
Huge Win!! DEMKO & Petey 🔥 🔥 https://t.co/Y1kvu9SkNh
@KieranSmyser @ThomasDrance Boo 👎 haha
@ThomasDrance He hasn’t said No 🤞
@ChrisConte79 @patersonjeff He’s saying the Avs are good on home ice as well
@ThomasDrance He’s took a few big hits last few games. Hopefully it’s nothing serious. Looking forward seeing Lockwood flying around the ice tonight
@BatchHockey Lockwoods in the lineup 🙌!!!
@taj1944 Isn’t Canada the hockey capital of the world ? We all know Connor is a great talent
@ChrisFaber39 So clutch !! What a goal to keep the season alive !

RT @AdamReid_: NHL 👏 STOP 👏 LOCAL 👏 BLACKOUTS 👏

I’m paying 300$ a season and I can’t watch the NHL games I want !!!! Not good enough @NHL…
@Hockey_Robinson What are your thoughts on Tanner Howe?
@danriccio_ https://t.co/nmgdHkWMri
@taj1944 @_EllieNuck_ So you DO read your comments.
@LeafRollin @RobTheHockeyGuy https://t.co/oJZ3O1Ym9D
@taj1944 @GradySas Yup. Did you see Marc methot comments as well. He won’t be missed
@ThomasDrance Good good 👍
@ChrisFaber39 Big goal to tie the game.
@ChrisConte79 A one time Calder hopeful…
@TheStanchion He’s in a mood that’s for sure. Lucky he didn’t get a slashing penalty last shift. Lol. Come on Miller pull it together you got this.
@ThomasDrance Hamonic accidentally stepped on him 😬 hope he’s okay
@QuadreIli Horvat Going at it again.  To bad Larkin got stepped on. 😬
@DanMachholz Decent start by Canucks. Could’ve had a few goals in the first half of the period. Wings also could’ve had a couple closing out the period. Demko doing his thing for sure!!
@ThomasDrance Multiple guys on both teams with easy giveaways and odd missed pass attempts.
@LachInTheCrease “The midget” still in the heads of zadina and crew apparently.  Scheen didn’t play in Detroit. Glad he’s in the lineup tonight
@DanMachholz Looks good tonight
@jabo_vancouver Not having a good start at all. Does he think he’s still on Canucks ?
@SatiarShah It’s “the midget” vs zadina rematch.
@ThomasDrance Garland “the midget” vs zadina rematch. Haha
@jabo_vancouver Hutton - Pouliot pairing coming up.
@NHL_Watcher Remember their slow start. Lol.
@Hockey_Robinson @NHL_Watcher Both Regina Pats
@jabo_vancouver “This market” key. He was traded for a guy this market also hated. You’d think that’d be enough to enjoy his hard work , no maintenance game.
@GradySas Freedie freeman on the way 🇨🇦
@TheStanchion Definitely. Minutes 54-59ish was like watching peewee hockey and it played perfect to Tampas plan to run down the clock. Had some possession time with Demko out but not much. 👎
@passittobulis Don’t forget pearsons letter high pass
@canucker101 Thought the play was dead. Wooo !!! I’ll take it
@SatiarShah Wow !!! I’ll take it !!
@TheStanchion Then gets called for shoving seconds later. Weak 🙄
@TheStanchion Myers too tall and scheen too much man sometimes in the eyes of the zebras
@SatiarShah Scheen to strong and Myers to tall sometimes. 🙄
@jabo_vancouver Lame call. Literally seconds  after scheen / maroon battle
@canucker101 That was weak.
@NHL_Watcher Matthews , That was his jaw not shoulder lol
@ChrisFaber39 https://t.co/metlR96jCf
@ThomasDrance #88 is good
@jabo_vancouver Damn. To bad we spotted them 2 now bolts can sit back big time as I see they are doing…. Big comeback on the way , just have to get that 1st one
@SatiarShah Not sure if we can’t wait till intermission. Maybe garland can spark the boys , he’s done it before.
@BikNizzar Puck bounces over hamonic stick and can’t recover. But this start has been really flat. Need to get going really quick
@maverick_kris @jabo_vancouver Hahaha. Let’s hope not 😬
@jabo_vancouver Minimal penalties plz. Like zero would be ideal.
@willguibr @LeafRollin Lol. Nice try but still missed and drilled the guy straight to side of the head. Still suspension worthy 100%
@SNBradFay Lol. True true. Remember the Brett Favre retirements haha
@Hockey_Robinson Thinking the same thing. Maybe we will be surprised by department of player safety… stick doesn’t even ride up the shoulder pad, just straight to face.
@patersonjeff I would assume so as well. But I won’t hold my breathe
@leterrypien @canucker101 Extra plus some games missed
@ChrisConte79 Holy 🤬. Let’s see what player safety does here. Has to be games missed
@LeafRollin But I do  like his tenacity and willingness to stick up for teammates from time to time
@LeafRollin He’s not a R

tweets.text: @derekw306 @camcharronyvr The https://t.co/NMW3npEqu8 app was excellent. This is not.

@camcharronyvr Really ? That was my impression but I could be wrong. I’ve only had time for the Canucks. The preds home game was gone after 24hrs that’s the one I missedstarted with the basic package but they had weird games blacked out for reasons i have no clue..there has to be a better way

@risingaction It's shocking. The league should really step in. No way this fills the void left by NHL Live.

Anybody with Sportsnet Now premium, can you check to see if any of the nationally-televised games from Wednesday night are available for you? I couldn't load the Canucks-Sharks game to track it last night.

Aren’t you guys sick of debating about the #Canucks yet? They suck. They’ll suck if they keep Boeser. They’ll suck if they trade him for picks. They’ll suck forever no matter what. That pain you feel is the feeling of maturing from a #newfan into a #realfan. Welcome to the club.

It was always odd that Luongo was like the one player who didn’t go on LTIR to end his anchor contract.

Players out here getting allergic to hockey pucks to end on LTIR and Lu with actual hip issues ends up with two GMs unable to figure the easy shit out. https://t.co/HE33ZxwusX
Ethan Bear ain’t taking shit from little Timmy Stutz

McDavid

got to the second letter of the alphabet before i decided this book was a mistake lol https://t.co/BEINlOr9Cq

It was so easy to see watch the #Canucks the past few years and blame the defense for how bad they were defensively. The fact is team defense is only as good as the 5 guys on the ice knowing their responsibilities and that's something they are finally being taught. #Canucks https://t.co/AkrALkY6Rf

We need to be talking more about how impressive Tanner Howe (2024) has been this year. 

He’s up to 26 goals and 65 points in 61 games - that’s the 5th best D-2 season in WHL history. 

He has ~3 games remaining to keep climbing that list

Yesterday we lost an amazing woman. 

One of the most important people in raising me. My stepmom Nikki Faber died from a stroke.

She was the kindest, most giving and nurturing person.

My dad will never be the same but we are going to get all the family together and do our best.

@13_dmac Hey I'm all for a total revamp of the defense next season, I am just waiting to see if that even happens.

Until then, I fantasy book with what I got.
@HerrDrFunk @tommykippes2 Could finally say ‘Canucks have won the Cup’

Remember, in case someone wants to argue about the professional competence of the previous #Canucks regime:

This was their all-in, "Goku spending 15 episodes to create the Spirit Bomb" season. 

What an absolute mess for the Rutherford regime to clean up.
@krusty027 @Hockey_Robinson Josh Holden for me. He was compared to Roenick and he was one of my favourites.
#canmnt qualified for the World Cup today https://t.co/mcie3qzdhC
@derekw306 Bedard is tracking to be on another level, but one in the hand and all that..

@derekw306 @Hockey_Robinson I have seen quite a few of those comments this season. People just expect every 1st overall pick to be a superstar right away. Ya, like player development works like that… lol

On a per-game basis, Jack Hughes is currently working on a top-30 U21 season EVER in the NHL. 

Ever!

His 1.16 points per game are equal to Jagr's 20 yo season. It's ahead of Messier's, Malkin's, Stamkos' and Yzerman's. 

Translation: It's good.
@Hockey_Robinson Don’t even think about it is right ….Who are these people ? Lol. Did “they” think he’s another Yakupov ?

Alexis Lafrenière is making the most of his minutes these days. 

Over his six-game point streak, he's repping 4.8 points-per-60. That sits 18th in the league - ahead of guys like Marner and MacKinnon. 

Don't even think about writing this kid off early.
